name: Mac & Cheese By Terry Crews (Mack And Jeezy) Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: elbow macaroni, cream-style cottage cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, sour cream, egg, salt, coconut oil, paprika
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cream-style cottage cheese (or small curd)
recipeInstructionSteps: Cook macaroni “al dente” according to package directions. Drain with cold water.
In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cheese, sour cream, egg, and salt. Fold in macaroni.
Grease a 2-quart (2 liters) casserole dish with coconut oil.
Spoon mixture into casserole dish and sprinkle with extra cheese and paprika.
